content.prompt: On the island of Mabera, the local money is called “favoli.” The price of every good in Mabera is expressed as the number of favolis needed to buy the good. The use of favolis to express the price of goods describes which function of money?

topic.text: 4.3: Definition, Measurement, and Functions of Money
